ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) -> ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX N ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY N ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX N ) /\ ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY N ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = N -> ( A rmX a ) = ( A rmX N ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( a = N -> ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX a ) <-> ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX N ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = N -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY N ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( a = N -> ( ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY a ) <-> ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY N ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( a = N -> ( ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX a ) /\ ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY a ) ) <-> ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX N ) /\ ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY N ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX N ) /\ ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY N ) ) ) -> E. a e. ZZ ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX a ) /\ ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY a ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 4, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> E. a e. ZZ ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX a ) /\ ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY a ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_frmx | |- rmX : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> NN0 |
| 14 | 13 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmX N ) e. NN0 ) |
| 15 |  | #P_frmy | |- rmY : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> ZZ |
| 16 | 15 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 17 |  | #P_rmxycomplete | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ ( A rmX N ) e. NN0 /\ ( A rmY N ) e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( ( A rmX N ) ^ 2 ) - ( ( ( A ^ 2 ) - 1 ) x. ( ( A rmY N ) ^ 2 ) ) ) = 1 <-> E. a e. ZZ ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX a ) /\ ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY a ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 12, 14, 16, 17 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( ( A rmX N ) ^ 2 ) - ( ( ( A ^ 2 ) - 1 ) x. ( ( A rmY N ) ^ 2 ) ) ) = 1 <-> E. a e. ZZ ( ( A rmX N ) = ( A rmX a ) /\ ( A rmY N ) = ( A rmY a ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 11, 18 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( A rmX N ) ^ 2 ) - ( ( ( A ^ 2 ) - 1 ) x. ( ( A rmY N ) ^ 2 ) ) ) = 1 ) |
